'''Notes'''
Good choice for Linux laptop, especially after memory upgrade from default 256MB. To have analog modem working you have to use proprietar drivers (system-administration-aditional drivers)
Out of fire hardware buttons on the top of keyboard (email, search, info, lock, help) only lock button works.
